alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 26 at 10:54AM CDT until October 26 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL ATASCOSA...WEST CENTRAL WILSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL BEXAR COUNTIES... At 1053 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pleasanton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Floresville, Jourdanton, Poteet, Leming, Sandy Oaks, Mitchell Lake, Losoya, Graytown, Thelma, Coughran, Amphion, and Espey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
